data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Gävleborg access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gävleborg, Sweden
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 276,600 people living in Gävleborg.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Gävleborg who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Spirit, encourage the disciples in Gävleborg, Sweden to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Bosniak people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, encourage the 15,893 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Gävleborg.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Gävleborg, Sweden has a population of 276,600.

We estimate Gävleborg has 15,893 people who might know Jesus, 138,629 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 122,079 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 17 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Gävleborg prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.
